share on x kb kathy blackmon. jun 13 at 8:30 pm lit a candle in memory of mr. walter j. stout sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ec eula cleveland. jun 13 at 5:46 pm lit a candle in memory of mr. walter j. stout sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x rr roberta rice. jun 13 at 4:11 pm ingrid and family ~ my thoughts, prayers and sympathies are with you all during this time. walt always made me smile and/or laugh when i was at hart care center with my dad. may he rest in peace! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bs brenda & buddy spears. jun 13 at 2:43 pm lit a candle in memory of mr. walter j. stout sr. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 13 at 1:50 pm orange and yellow sunflower mix (silk cemetery flowers) was purchased for the family of mr. walter j. stout sr.. share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook joseph a strickland funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
